snippet: BODENRADER--Andrew, 41, of Brooklyn, NY, died May 18th in New York. He was a lecturer and Director of Academic Writing at Manhattanville College in Purchase, NY. His proudest achievement was the development of the Writing Center at the school. Calling hours will be held Monday, May 23rd from 4-8pm at the Kenneth H. Pollard Funeral Home, 233 Lawrence St., Methuen, MA. For directions and online guestbook, please visit: pollardfuneralhome.com. 1/3
